page.title: 07The Shopping Centre,Abingdon
page.content: The supermarket employs 14 full time staff and 15 part time staff. Groceries are the most popular area of sale.The Video Rental has 1,011 members, renting out 200 video cassettes each week.Apart from videos,the shop sells records and posters.The chemist employs 3 staff.The pharmacist has to be on duty during opening hours.They sell baby products (most popular area)jewelry and drug preparations.40% of their presciptions are free.This is smaller than the national average as most of the customers are young couples with children.90% of the free prescriptions are for this group.Few of the other major group qualifying for free prescriptions (men over 65,women over 60) live on the nearby housing estates. The greengrocer employs 3 staff.They sell fruit,vegetables,flowers and pot plants.
